wikitext.*:
'''MerpCon III''' was the third annual free international convention dedicated to role playing gaming in [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[Middle-earth]]. The guest speaker was Doctor Thomas Morwinsky and the event was held in 2007 in Spokane, Washington.
